records.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
records.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

records.quote: Use what youâ€™ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
records.author: Yvonne Pierre

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

records.quote: When I rise, it will be with the ranks and not from the ranks.
records.author: Eugene V. Debs

records.quote: I will never die, especially not on a bicycle! That is a sure thing!
records.author: Juju Pepe

records.quote: The arc of the universe is long, but it bends toward crabs.
records.author: Some Hilarious Lady

records.quote: I don't want to eat one of the jello packs because I don't want to split up a family
records.author: Shara Crosslin
